slide.title: Error handling in general
slide.subtitle: Why must I do proper error handling?
slide.blurb: "If nothing goes wrong, my application runs well!"
"My users are experienced enough to deal with the errors of the underlying system!"

list.bullet: Low level error information can contain sensible information
Every user is annoyed by error messages
Think about people extending your code
Avoiding to present an error to the user makes an application comfortable
